Package suncertify.application

Provides the classes necessary to start and shut down an application.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Application Main class of the application.
ApplicationProperties Properties of the application, i.e. those used by client or server components.
BusinessService Provides a business method for each use case of the application: listing all valid records, searching for records by name and/or location and booking a record.
CleanExitShutdownHook Thread that can be registered as a shutdown hook for the application.
DBAccessFactory Factory that can create instances implementing the DBAccess interface.
 

Enum Summary
ApplicationMode Enumeration of the application modes.
 

Package suncertify.application Description

Provides the classes necessary to start and shut down an application.
